body_html:
@vrv Thanks, that worked! The python 3 installation instructions are already published in the docs so I assumed it was official.

$ python --version
Python 3.4.3
$ wget https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/cpu/tensorflow-0.6.0-cp34-cp34m-linux_x86_64.whl
...
$ mv tensorflow-0.6.0-cp34-cp34m-linux_x86_64.whl tensorflow-0.6.0-cp34-none-linux_x86_64.whl
$ pip install -U tensorflow-0.6.0-cp34-none-linux_x86_64.whl
...
Successfully installed numpy-1.10.1 protobuf-3.0.0a3 setuptools-18.7.1 six-1.10.0 tensorflow-0.6.0 wheel-0.26.0

body:
@vrv Thanks, that worked! The python 3 installation instructions are already published in the docs so I assumed it was official.

``` sh
$ python --version
Python 3.4.3
$ wget https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/cpu/tensorflow-0.6.0-cp34-cp34m-linux_x86_64.whl
...
$ mv tensorflow-0.6.0-cp34-cp34m-linux_x86_64.whl tensorflow-0.6.0-cp34-none-linux_x86_64.whl
$ pip install -U tensorflow-0.6.0-cp34-none-linux_x86_64.whl
...
Successfully installed numpy-1.10.1 protobuf-3.0.0a3 setuptools-18.7.1 six-1.10.0 tensorflow-0.6.0 wheel-0.26.0
```
